short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tripleyetech's plugin enhances web safety by scanning for threats like phishing and malware, ensuring secure and fast browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every website is checked by our extension's security algorithm. By combining real-time data with sophisticated algorithms, our plugin determines the site's safety. This innovative method identifies a plethora of online dangers.

To keep you safe in the digital world, Tripleyetech has developed a proactive security system that can adapt to new threats. Internet security enthusiasts who value speed and security will like this plugin. Quickly, easily, and securely enhance your web experience by installing Tripleyetech's extension.

You may alert domain registrars and hosting providers to potentially dangerous, fraudulent, or suspicious websites using the plugin's one-click reporting feature.

When you pin Tripleyetech's safeguard extension to browser's toolbar, you'll be able to see real-time data of the number of hazardous and non-harmful external components loaded into your browser by websites and also your exposed attack surface. As the proportion of total external components to hazardous ones grows, the badge backdrop will also shift from green to red.
